Invocation Name: scientist escape the room seven
des:
Welcome to Scientist Escape the room 7 by Dr. Song. <This is Pandemic edition!>
You wake up and find yourself turned into Santa. You have to escape the room with Rudolph. You have use clues and think scientifically to handle this situation! Look around to collect clues (information), check objects that you find and Use the clues together with a simple scientific knowledge. Once you understand the clues, you carry out your brilliant way for this situation!

To start, just say "Alexa, open scientist escape the room 7"

<Contact info: If you have any question or suggestion, please leave comments.>

<About this version>
This game is free to play now.

<How to play>
If you want to look around to collect clues, Say "Look forward" or "Look right". (Forward, up, down, right, and left)
If you find something and get more information(clue) from an object found, Say, for example, "Check the door".
If you want to use an object you found on the other object, Say, for example, "Use the red key on the bathtub". 
If you want to listen to the instruction again, Say, "Help me".
If you need a hint, Say, "Give me a hint".
If you need more time, Say "More time".
You can leave, stop, quit the game anytime by saying "Stop" or "Quit".
